...You're so persistent. Aren't you afraid of me?

I bet it's tiring to have Lip around. She's so slow, dumb, and boring to talk to.
However, she does possess the function of self-reflection, so please be patient with her and take care of her.
At least you can handle that much, right?
...Hmph. I don't care about a man like that anymore. Anymore... I said not anymore! Argh! I really want to give him a beating, regardless of love or not! I want to punch that playboy face of his!

The most beautiful man in the Round Table? Oh, you mean Tris? So he was the number one within the Round Table? I see... Well, there's nothing bad about him as long as he keeps his mouth shut, and his voice isn't half bad... I guess that's valid.
But a man like him just gets on my nerves.

Come to think of it, we do see that knight often. Who, you ask? I'm talking about Gawain. He can be insensitive sometimes, but he does take care of Lip well...
No. That's not right. It's not right for Lip to get her knight in shining armor before I do...

Um, Master? I thought I saw the goddess Artemis...

Besides, Artemis is one of the few goddesses I admire. So she can't be that voluptuous bimbo who's into a stuffed ani—
You're kidding. Are you saying I'm going to turn into a nauseating, PDA-obsessed couple like them...!?

Oh, there's even a wonderful writer of children's stories.

...Tsk, you got me there.

I'm the Alter Ego of pleasure, Meltryllis.
I'd really rather not, but I suppose I'll form a contract with you. You should be honored, okay?
Like this?
Let's enjoy this.
Hehe. So delicious.

Arhat, the Four Inverted Views!

Happy birthday.
Let's enjoy a leisurely, languid, loving day together.

Hm. Is that a battle I hear?
They say the world cannot be rid of conflict, but grating on one's ears is unforgiveable.
Let us punish them, Master.

They say that too much rest can be its own poison.
Why not try moving about, Master?

You wish to know my purpose?
As I have taken the vow to serve as a Servant, I shall lead you to enlightenment with all of my being.

No matter what the past between us holds, as we have formed a contract, our relationship as Master and Servant is true.
...Yes, until the very end, allow me to satiate myself to the fullest...

What I like...?
Why, humans, of course.
Oh, and I like sweet rice balls coated with sweet red beans!
And...nursery tales. But I am a woman now, so I may not enjoy such things forever.

What I hate. Ah, there is one thing.
Pessimistic, foul-mouthed and narrow-minded sorts. Men whose every action is thorny, prickly, and truculent. I simply cannot stand those types.

Holy Grail? Is it like the skull rituals?
The claim that it can grant any wish makes it seem a sham. I believe it is a thing far from benevolent...
Sessyoin Kiara. I heard your call, and I have come. Please, allow yourself to drown, to indulge in the pleasures of my body all you like.

I am a Servant now, but I am also a clergywoman who listens to the doubts and pains of others and heals their minds and spirits. So, please, confess your troubles to me. Unburden yourself. I shall embrace you with my entire being.

(Sigh) ...I am bored.
I've never met a more naive and restrained person than you... Unless... Do you truly believe that I am indeed a good person...?
If that is so... Whatever shall I do?
Indeed I said I would do anything you want me to do. But, do I really have to change my ways?

Yes, what is it, Master?
Please, rest assured that I have not taken in any new believers, just as you ordered.
Hehe. I am starting to understand how to interact with you.
When in a clear stream, follow its pure and simple path...and enjoy it...
I dare not defile it.
Mmmm... Not yet.

To try to save the world as one whose talents are so ordinary, and with such a feeble soul... What an impossible feat. I thought you would have given up already.
You have turned out to be an extraordinarily noble being, strengthened by many intersecting lives and bonds.
Yes. I see that now, and I shall step up to the cause as well.
Dragging such a noble being to the depths would be the ultimate celestial pleasure. Let us race to see who will give up first.
I so desperately wish for you to overcome all of my wickedness, Master.

Oh. So that boy is named Andersen?
I do not know. I do not know of that person at all.
Melons, cow-woman, a whore who crawled out of a sewer... No, I do not remember those words at all!
As such, please do not invite him into the same room, or especially the same party as me. Do you understand?
...For mercy's sake.

Ah. So he also turned into a Servant as well.
White hair, a twisted mind, dual-wielding guns...
Hehe...what ill fate.
The great hero of justice who drenched his own hands in blood, destroying my many followers... All to defeat my own evil.
Hehe...how amusing. A fall from grace, and all that remains is the decay. Am I right?

Ah...I never expected the Beast that has paired with me is Kama instead of Mara...
There's no denying that she's younger than me, but isn't she a bit...too graceless?

Oh. To think that the lord of Demon God Pillars is at Chaldea. Do you have no dignity as the one who was vanquished?
Well, I suppose I have no room to talk.
We should both be wary of a knife in the back.

You wish to know my purpose?
As I have taken the vow to serve as a Servant, I shall lead you to enlightenment with all of my being.
Ah, but...
The thought of your feverish desire for salvation through this body... Exquisite...
I want to melt with you...

Ah Master, you have come for a visit?
It appears that these sets of battles are quite arduous.
I hope these items will be of help to you.

Teehee. Item exchanges are nice. Collecting things that are both lacking and excessive and then combining them to create some sort of unique result...
Even during my childhood, I played shell matching games. Well, I played those games because there really was nothing but reading as far as entertainment went.

Ah, Master is so absorbed in offering so many precious things to me...
While I know this is all intended to help resolve this Singularity, I may still lose myself...

My, you have collected so much!
Please take this.
An unobtainable life gained justly through ceaseless efforts.
I enjoy witnessing these things so very much... Teehee...

This is just one measure of salvation.
Normally I do not require anything of value... But people never cease to offer me gifts for some reason...

Good work on exorcising the vulgar Beast that was rampaging around the realm.
I was holding my breath watching the entire thing unfold...
Ah...even though she was our enemy, I was a bit jealous seeing her treated so roughly...
I may consider going off the rails again one of these days...

Oh my. The incident has been resolved, and you have offered everything...yet you still have business with me?
Teehee... Could it be that the flame of passion within your soul is not completely satiated? 
Choosing quantity over quality when it comes to indulging oneself in women's hell is so childish.
Yet I take it that you would like to drown yourself in the sweet hell of women that engulfs all... Am I correct?
May you enjoy all the weight of passionate madness you can stand, and a little more...

Alter Ego, Sessyoin Kiara.
I have come to answer the voices calling for salvation.
But...hehe...
I wonder about the sort of person who would summon a woman like me.
I am the Devilish Bodhisattva who savors all living creatures, sentient or not.
You have no choice now but to stay with me until the very end.
You will submit to me!
Enemy sighted.
You cannot escape!
Eli-chan Drill!

It seems like there are some foolish people who do not know their place. Let's head out, Master.

Vital checks...completed.
You seem to have extra energy to expend. Go out to train.

I may be a Servant, but I protect Castle Csejte.
I haven't joined your side, so don't get the wrong idea.

You are my pilot candidate.
I will obey your orders, but I must prioritize justice.
Should you succumb to the temptations of evil, I intend to self-destruct with you.
...Though I know you would never do such a thing.

What I like is a well-organized managerial hierarchy. And beautiful steel...
That is to say, me.

What I dislike? Do you want me to get angry?
Obviously, it would be irresponsible land owners, lazy, indolent nobility, and me whenever I go berserk!
Other than that...let's see...
I don't think such things exist, but an octopus-shaped robot...
That would be terrifying...

The fact that I exist proves that the Holy Grail can grant miracles.
So, then...let's see...
I would hope that there will one day be a time when my nation no longer needs me and I can sleep in peace...

Desperate times call for desperate measures.
I'm going to shake off my shameful defeat and fight alongside with you to maintain peace at Csejte.
But don't get the wrong idea.
This is just a temporary contract.
All I'm doing is considering you for the position of pilot candidate.

I am an Alter Ego, and I was once a powerful enemy who threw you into the depths of despair. And even now I am an acting land owner with an esteemed position. But there's no need for you to worry too much. I don't mind that you still don't trust me. I'm made of steel, after all.

It seems you are using me quite often.
I am, however, still incomplete.
As a special treat, I will share with you the four rules to satisfy me.
First: gaze in awe at my gallant figure.
Second: make my maintenance a top priority.
Third: delicately file my tail.
Fourth: always give me physical...I mean, metal contact.
That's all. Now, repeat what I just said.

Very good! That was a great battle, Master!

...(Sigh) It seems like my thought process is on the fritz ever since I've been with you.
As a land owner, I must contain myself.

I've realized that we've spent a great deal of time together in battle.
It's been longer than it took for me to manifest as a Servant and contract with you.
I am made of steel, so the passing of time does not affect me much...
But I do understand the importance and weight of the time you spent with me.
I appreciate your kindness, Master.
Now, I shall act as your guardian as well.
Whether it be in the depths of the earth or in a fierce storm, let's continue to battle together!

...What would you do if I proposed a bet like that?
The answer should be...

What you should do is to hold on to your glass before you drink and just don't let go of it.

The fourth glass.
In Asian nations, the number four is believed to be unlucky because it sounds like the word for "death," while the number thirteen is considered unlucky in the West.
But as such, evil villains like us quite embrace these numbers!
Huh? You don't consider yourself a villain?

We're finally at our sixth glass.
Six, six, six... Three sixes are even unluckier than thirteen.
It's the number of the Beast.

Let me take that last glass from you.

Eh? I'm calmer and more reserved than before?

I'm a full-fledged worker in society now! The old me that used to run wild is long gone now! There are good and evil Servants, after all. But if they're Sabers, I'll get rid of them no matter what!
Why did I join the force, you ask? Because the Servant Universe began its new season. Since I'm grown up now, I found a job with the Galactic Police and use my powers to protect space!

Hmmm, delicious!
Thank you for treating me to Earth's specialty foods again! But to be honest, I'm not allowed to eat food from other planets because of sanitary concerns and quarantine. Eh? Do I think it's okay for a cop to ignore the rules?
Fufufu...just because I'm a cop doesn't mean I should be bound by the law. After all, there are some evildoers who can't be defeated by legal means alone.

I meant to be an adult who would save Master, but instead I was the one who ended up getting saved...

(Gasp) Could this feeling be because...there is a Saber-class evil god somewhere on this world!? I know we're still eating, but you will have to excuse me! I'm just going to go save the planet real quick!
